short_summary: Electrical and Mechanical Maintenance on the LaSalle Causeway
description: The contract is for the provision of electrical and mechanical maintenance services on the LaSalle Causeway in Kingston, Ontario. The contract period is from June 1st 2024 to May 31st 2026 inclusive, with the option to extend for 3 additional 12-month periods. Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided for complete details.

### Title

### Title (French)

#### Contact Information

Email: jeffrey.cooper@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) - Real Property Branch is seeking a qualified contractor to provide electrical and mechanical maintenance on the LaSalle Causeway in Kingston, Ontario. The contract has a period of 2 years inclusive, with the option to extend for 3 additional 12-month periods. The solicitation number for this opportunity is WS4351264311. For complete details, please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided. 
Note that the closing time for this solicitation has been amended to February 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time may be declared non-responsive. Aviso: Please
